title: Harry Potter Quotes Quiz v1.1.2 Android
description:
Quiz (trivia) based on character quotes of seven fantasy novels written by the British author J. K. Rowling - the Harry Potter series. Questions of various difficulty will allow you to fill knowledge gaps about character quotes, as well as provide much entertainment. Check your knowledge of Harry Potter series with our quiz!

Features:
- Over 200 english language questions!
- 3 game modes - Classic, Sudden Death and Time Challenge!
- Compendium - All quotes used in the program sorted by champions in one place!
- Score depends on the time and number of correct answers - Who of your friends will earn the most points?
- Plenty of configuration options!
- Choosing books - No matter if you read all books or not, this quiz is for you!
- Completely free!
- And much, much more...

Game modes:
- In Classic mode user tries to guess 15 quotes. The wrong answers does not interrupt the game.
- In Sudden Death mode user tries to guess 30 quotes, but when user selects a wrong answer loses.
- In Time Challenge mode user tries to guess 30 quotes. Response time for ALL questions is limited (correct answer adds some extra time) and if it runs out user loses. The wrong answer does not interrupt the game.


This is an unofficial app. The Harry Potter series belongs to J. K. Rowling.
